item.title: Test Post
item.description: This is just a test post letâ€™s add some libraries: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) ## ## Attaching package: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union Now how about a query: Batting%>% select(playerID,HR)%>% filter(HR>50) ## playerID HR ## 1 ruthba01 54 ## 2 ruthba01 59 ## 3 ruthba01 60 ## 4 ruthba01 54 ## 5 wilsoha01 56 ## 6 foxxji01 58 ## 7 greenha01 58 ## 8 kinerra01 51 ## 9 mizejo01 51 ## 10 kinerra01 54 ## 11 mayswi01 51 ## 12 mantlmi01 52 ## 13 mantlmi01 54 ## 14 marisro01 61 ## 15 mayswi01 52 ## 16 fostege01 52 ## 17 fieldce01 51 ## 18 mcgwima01 52 ## 19 griffke02 56 ## 20 griffke02 56 ## 21 mcgwima01 70 ## 22 sosasa01 66 ## 23 mcgwima01 65 ## 24 sosasa01 63 ## 25 bondsba01 73 ## 26 gonzalu01 57 ## 27 rodrial01 52 ## 28 sosasa01 64 ## 29 rodrial01 57 ## 30 thomeji01 52 ## 31 jonesan01 51 ## 32 howarry01 58 ## 33 ortizda01 54 ## 34 rodrial01 54 ## 35 bautijo02 54 ## 36 davisch02 53
